item.description:
What: LOWELL FOLK FESTIVAL

When: July 27, 2008 12:00 PM

Where: Click the link below to find out!

Meetup Description: What: LOWELL FOLK FESTIVAL

When: July 27, 2008 12:00 PM



Meetup Description: The Lowell Folk Festival has been a yearly event for more than 20 years. It is the largest FREE Folk Festival in the country and encompasses 6 music stages prominently placed across the city offering varied settings & styles of performances. The festival has grown and is huge!
Learn more @ :
www.lowellfolkfestival.org
UPDATED 7/23/08: We will meetup just outside the JOHN ST GARAGE across from Boardinghouse Park at noon. It will be very congested.. I will have a meetup sign. Other groups are expected to join us. WE WAIT 10 MINUTES for "YES!" RSVPs... we do not wait for "maybes." If you know you will be late? I will send you my cell# to get in touch with me ( in a separate email message)

GO TO: http://lowellfolkfest...
for a map of our meetup location (and also the festival)

****The Lowell Folk Festival includes 6 stages of entertainmnet, ethnice foods arts & crafts of all kinds all over the city! It's HUGE! therefore we mau break off into small groups...
***** A lot of walking is involved... make sure you wear comfy shoes... Also, you may wish to bring a blanket? or chair as there usually is no seating at any of the venues.


COST: FREE
**Performances & activities within the festival are FREE. Food, beverages, and sale merchandise are not.
item.how_to_find_us: Included in the details of the event
item.name: Lowell Folk Festival
